attributes.action: blanket ban on all legal highs
attributes.additional_details: My brother died from taking a legal high 4,4-dmar just because they are legal does not mean they are OK to take. Legal highs are even sold at festivals on stalls. My brother died from a rare legal high but there are many more around these drugs are not safe they are lethal something has to be done They are too easy to get hold of but deadly let's stop this I don't want people to go threw the same heart ache!
